text: @realDonaldTrump @seanhannity @FoxNews He put America lowest in the ranks except for COVID19 DEATHS.  Posed with Mt Rushmore in background like he belonged there!  What a JOKE!  Majority of Americans Hate you and your White Supremacist terrorists.
